name: vcard-to-csv
title: vCard to CSV Converter
description: Convert vCard (.vcf) contact files to CSV spreadsheet format
content:
Overview

This application converts vCard (.vcf) contact files to CSV format using the vobject library. Export contacts from your phone, email client, or contact management system into a spreadsheet-friendly format.

Features

  • Extract all contact details (name, email, phone, etc.)
  • Parse structured names (first, last, middle, prefix, suffix)
  • Handle multiple emails, phones, and addresses per contact
  • Extract organization and title information
  • Include URLs, birthdays, and notes
  • Support for multiple vCards in a single file

CSV Output Columns

  • Full Name, First/Last/Middle Name, Prefix, Suffix
  • Organization, Title
  • Primary Email/Phone, All Emails/Phones (with types)
  • Addresses (with types), URLs
  • Birthday, Note, UID

Parameters

  • Input vCard File: Upload your .vcf file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the CSV output

Output

The application generates a CSV file named {original_name}.csv with all contact information in spreadsheet format.

Use Cases

  • Export iPhone/Android contacts
  • Convert Outlook or Gmail contacts
  • Analyze contact data in Excel or Google Sheets
  • Migrate contacts between systems
  • Backup and archive contact information
  • Create mailing lists from contact cards
